Name: Consent for Audio-Video Recording
ServerSideScript:
Class FormScriptEvents


Function StrHash(str)
    if not IsNull(str) and not IsEmpty(str) then
        Dim i, hash
        hash = 5381

        For i = 1 To Len(str)
            hash = hash + (Asc(Mid(str, i, 1)) * 33)
        Next

        StrHash = hash
    else
        StrHash = ""
    end if
End Function


private sub OnCreate()
    theForm("consentHTML") = theForm.execScalerSQL("select top 1 ConsentHTML from ct_ConsentsHTMLVersions where ConsentName = 'Consent to Audio-Video Recording'")

    pop()
end sub
private sub OnLoad()
    pop()
end sub
private sub OnSave()
    ' consentHTML = theForm.execScalerSQL("select top 1 ConsentHTML from ct_ConsentsHTMLVersions where ConsentName = 'Consent to Audio-Video Recording'")
    ' theForm("debug") = StrHash(consentHTML)

    if theForm("__locked") then
        name = theForm.execScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
        theForm.execScalerSQL("exec cstm_FormRoutingTempReplacement @FormInstanceGUID = '" & theForm("__forminstanceguid") & "', @Subject = 'Consent for Audio-Video Recording Submitted from portal', @Description = 'Form Submitted for " & name & "', @FormDefinitionGUID = '" & theForm("__formguid") & "'")
    end if
    theForm("chkAutoSend") = false
    theform("chkNested")=true
end sub
sub OnAfterSave()
    if theForm("chkFirstSignOff") Then
        On Error Resume Next
            name = theForm.execScalerSQL("select First + ' ' + Last from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.tostring & "'")
            subject = "Consent for Audio-Video Recording"
            Description = "Form Submitted for " & name & "."
            theForm.execScalerSQL("exec cstm_FormRoutingTempReplacement @FormInstanceGUID = '" & theForm("__forminstanceguid").tostring & "', @Subject = '" & subject & "', @Description = '" & Description & "', @FormDefinitionGUID = '" & theForm("__formguid").tostring & "'")
        Err.Clear      ' Clear any possible Error that previous code raised
        If Err.Number <> 0 Then
            Err.Clear             ' Clear the Error
        End If
        On Error Goto 0 
    end if
end sub
private sub pop()
    theForm("dateOfBirth") = theForm.execScalerSQL("select CAST(dob as datetime) from Contact where ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGUID.toString & "' ")
    theForm("txtUserGroupGUID") = theForm.execScalerSQL("SELECT UserGroupGUID From UserGroup where UserGroupGUID = '" & TheForm.User.userguid.tostring & "' ")
    Dim contactGUID
    contactGUID = theForm.execScalerSQL("SELECT CAST(ContactGUID As varchar(36)) FROM PortalUsers WHERE ContactGUID = '" & theForm.DataStore.OwnerObjectGuid.ToString() & "'; ")
    
    If IsNull(contactGUID) Or contactGUID = "NULL" Or Trim(contactGUID) = "" Then
        theForm("chkIsPortalUser") = false
    Else
        theForm("chkIsPortalUser") = true
        If theForm("chkFirstSignOff") = false  Then
            theForm("chkAutoSend") = true
        End If
    End If
end sub
End Class
